title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Notes on a Scandal
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Timothy Noah discuss Notes on a Scandal, starring Judi Dench and Cate Blanchett. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
        

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
